[**Remark:**]{} This module (ref.[@BCT2k6]) is essential for solving the
quasi-Yang-Baxter equation which is an important relation in
Mathematical Physics.\
[*Drinfel’d modules:*]{} Let us consider a module that operates over a
ring of functions on a curve over a finite field, which is called an
[*elliptic module*]{}. Such modules were first studied by Vladimir
Drinfel’d in 1973 and called accordingly Drinfel’d modules.
